definition.name: combine-prs
definition.description: Combine multiple PRs into a single PR
definition.author: Grant Birkinbine

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: The GitHub token used to create an authenticated client - Provided for you by default!

inputs.name: branch_prefix
inputs.description: The prefix of the branches to combine

inputs.name: pr_title
inputs.description: The title of the pull request to create

inputs.name: pr_body_header
inputs.description: The header of the pull request body

inputs.name: min_combine_number
inputs.description: The minimum number of PRs that have to match criteria in order to create a combined PR

inputs.name: branch_regex
inputs.description: The regex to match the branches to combine - more control than branch_prefix

inputs.name: ci_required
inputs.description: Whether or not CI should be passing to combine the PR

inputs.name: review_required
inputs.description: Whether or not a review should be required to combine the PR

inputs.name: combine_branch_name
inputs.description: The name of the branch to combine the PRs into

inputs.name: ignore_label
inputs.description: The label to ignore when combining PRs

inputs.name: select_label
inputs.description: The label marking PRs that should be combined

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: A comma seperated list of labels to add to the combined PR

inputs.name: assignees
inputs.description: A comma seperated list of assignees to add to the combined PR

inputs.name: autoclose
inputs.description: Whether or not to close combined PRs if the combined PR is merged

inputs.name: update_branch
inputs.description: Whether or not to update the combined branch with the latest changes from the base branch after creating the combined pull request

inputs.name: create_from_scratch
inputs.description: Whether or not to start from a clean base branch when (re)creating the combined PR

outputs.name: pr_url
outputs.description: The pull request URL if a PR was created

outputs.name: pr_number
outputs.description: The pull request number if a PR was created
